revised_title: A Detailed Analysis of the Life Cycle of Adelea ovata and a New Observation of Gregarine from Lithobius forficatus Gut
tldr: The author investigates the life cycle of Adelea ovata, a gregarine parasite found in the gut of centipedes, and discovers new insights into its sexual phases and the formation of microgametes. The study also reveals a new gregarine from the gut of Lithobius forficatus.
